trans-unit.source: Enables setting message-level security properties on the wsDualHttpBinding binding.
This object is accessed from the binding by means of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding.Security%2A> property, which returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity> object.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property provides a reference to the MessageSecurityOverHttp object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> class.
Specifies the algorithm suite used for security messages at the SOAP level.
This property is most relevant when working with a non-[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] platform that uses a set of algorithms that are different than the default.
You should be aware of the strengths and weaknesses of the relevant algorithms when making modifications to this setting.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite"></xref>.
The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256*>.
The value of AlgorithmSuite is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Specifies the type of client credential used for client authentication in the wsHttpBinding or wsDualHttpBinding bindings.
This property is used to set the `MessageCredentialType` that is used to authenticate the caller at the service.

Valid types are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>.
The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>.
The value of ClientCredentialType is not a valid <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>.

Only used in extensibility scenarios to indicate whether an instance of a class derived from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> is configured to perform secure conversation as described in WS-SecurityConversation.
Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, unless overridden in a derived class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service credential is provisioned at the client out of band or is obtained from the service through a process of negotiation.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if service credential is obtained through a process of negotiation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
